name: squeezr
description: Another take on device-aware adaptive images and server side CSS3 media queries

scripts.test: rm -Rf tmp squeezr/cache/* && istanbul test _mocha --report html -- tests/*.js --reporter spec && squeezr/vendor/bin/phpunit
scripts.test-hhvm: rm -Rf tmp squeezr/cache/* && istanbul test _mocha --report html -- tests/*.js --reporter spec && squeezr/vendor/bin/phpunit --coverage-clover build/logs/clover.xml

author: Joschi Kuphal <joschi@kuphal.net>
